original_text: The men of Judah captured another 10,000 alive and took them to the top of a rock and threw them down from the top of the rock, and they were all dashed to pieces.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 또 만 명을 사로잡아 가지고 바위 꼭대기에 올라가서 거기서 밀쳐 내려뜨려서 그들의 온 몸이 부서지게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The men of Judah captured another 10,000 alive
and took them to the top of a rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 바위 꼭대기로 끌고 갔다.

sentences.original_text: and threw them down from the top of the rock
and they were all dashed to pieces
